isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - CHASSIS FEATURES - FUEL TRANSFER PUMP SYSTEM - EXTENDED DESCRIPTION (2 pin pump)

svcproc.title: EXTENDED DESCRIPTION (2 pin pump)
svcproc.para: Ignition voltage is supplied to fuel transfer pump connector (9102) cavity B, through energized relay (4003) and a 10 amp fuse in the engine compartment power distribution center.
Chassis ground to the module is supplied to (9102) cavity A from ground stud (8803).
A gnd signal from the ESC connector (4004) pin 25 is supplied to (9102) cavity B, through energized relay (4003). This signal should be 12 volts when the engine is running.
